# INNote

**Class**

The content and metadata associated with a single note entry in your app.

## Declaration

```swift
class INNote
```

## Overview

When SiriKit asks you to create a note, use an instance of this class to specify the contents of the note.

## Initializing a Note Object

- **init(title:contents:groupName:createdDateComponents:modifiedDateComponents:identifier:)**: Initializes a note object with the specified contents and attributes.

## Getting the Note Content

- **title**: The title text for the note.
- **contents**: The main content of the note.

## Getting the Group Name

- **groupName**: The user-visible name of the group that contains the note.

## Getting the Modification Dates

- **createdDateComponents**: The creation date of the note.
- **modifiedDateComponents**: The date on which the intent most recently modified the note.

## Identifying the Note

- **identifier**: The unique identifier that you use to identify the note internally.

## Note Objects

- **INNoteContent**: An abstract class that defines the types of content contained in notes.
- **INTextNoteContent**: The textual content of a note.
- **INImageNoteContent**: An image contained in a note.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
